Adoptio.text: Hope to be with you in a few days

Adoreus.text: Hope to be with you next week

Adorno.text: Hope to be with you on ---

Adpluo.text: Hope to be with you this evening

Adrepo.text: Hope to be with you to-day

Adscisco.text: Hope to be with you to-morrow

Adscitus.text: Hope to see you this evening

Advenio.text: Shall be at home this evening

Advexi.text: Shall be at your house this evening Adversum. Shall be at your house to-day

Advigilo.text: Shall be at your office to-day

Adulator.text: Shall be at your office to-morrow

Adulor.text: Shall be in town and will see you on ---

Adumbro.text: Shall be in town to-day and will call on you at ---

Aduncus.text: Shall be in town to-morrow and will call on you at ---

Adytum.text: Wish to see you, and will remain here until ---
